lead_paragraph: FOX--Eugene. With heavy hearts we announce the passing of Eugene Fox, born September 28, 1933. Beloved partner, father, brother, grandfather, uncle and friend. Donations to the charity of your choice. Rose, Mark (Betsy), Larry (Rachel), Ken (Fran), Nellie (Chett), Dylan, Emma, Melanie 1/3
